desc: At PURELAND Beauty we are all about purity in our products and the purity of the land we use to grow our conditioning botanicals. So, we use “Natural Farming” techniques… which means: NO GMOs – NO PESTICIDES – NO WEED KILLERS – NO CHEMICAL FERTILIZERSare ever used on the land or plants that create PURELAND products.

layout.text: The Revolution of All-Natural Hair Care
